fields.label: Header Image
fields.name: header_image
fields.instructions: The header image to display at the top of the email.  Recommended dimensions: 640x100px

fields.label: Header Image Link
fields.name: header_image_link
fields.instructions: (Optional) If provided, the header image will link to this URL when clicked.

fields.label: Header Image Alt
fields.name: header_image_alt
fields.instructions: The text to place in the alt field of the header image.

fields.label: Title
fields.name: title
fields.instructions: Title displayed at the top of the email.  (This is not the same as the email's subject line.)

fields.label: Thumbnail
fields.name: thumbnail
fields.instructions: Images must be at least 640px wide.

fields.label: Article deck
fields.name: article_deck
fields.instructions: Note: multiple lines are not supported (all deck content will be displayed in a single paragraph in the email.)

fields.label: Image file
fields.name: image_file
fields.instructions: Images must be at least 640px wide.

fields.label: Alt text
fields.name: alt_text
fields.instructions: Text displayed by email clients that don't download images by default.  If no alt text is provided here, the attachment's alt text will be used (click "Edit" button on image to view).

fields.label: Links to URL
fields.name: links_to
fields.instructions: (Optional) URL to link the image to.

fields.label: Email Header
fields.name: email_header
fields.instructions: Select the header to use for this email.

fields.label: Hide Email Title
fields.name: email_hide_title
fields.instructions: If checked, the email title will not be displayed at the top of the email template.

fields.label: Email Signature
fields.name: email_signature
fields.instructions: Select the signature to use for this email.

fields.label: Email Footer
fields.name: email_footer
fields.instructions: Select the footer to use for this email.

fields.label: Enable UTM Param Insertion
fields.name: email_enable_utms
fields.instructions: Uncheck this box to disable automatic UTM param insertion on links in this email. Note that, even if this setting is enabled, the email's UTM Source, Medium, and Campaign values must be set below for automatic UTM insertion to take place.

fields.message:
Paragraph

Basic text content that spans the full width of its container. Use to add generic text blocks and lists.

Full-Width Image

An image that spans the full width of its container. Optionally link out to external content. Can be used for large infographic content, video thumbnails, and more.

Article

Consists of a thumbnail, title, and a deck, which link to some URL. Choose an existing Post to create an article with automatically, or create a custom article component with fully customizable fields. Use custom articles for Today stories and videos with descriptions.

Article List

A horizontal list of Articles with a small left-aligned thumbnail.

Two Column Row

A row of two equal-sized columns on desktop email clients. On mobile email clients, columns collapse and span the full width of the email. Each column can contain one component each.

Divider

A full-width divider with configurable width and color.
